title: (x) Seize The Day script - hand scripted {Yves}
content:
![font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20070226201607im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69802.jpg)   
   
anybody know what this font is?
author: anonymous

comments.content:
That's hand scripted: as you can see the three "e"s are different   
from one another.
